sqlMap.select:
select ORIGCARD_LIST_ID, ORDER_ID, CARD_NO, CARDHOLDER_ID, FIRST_NAME, AMOUNT, VALIDITY_PERIOD, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CARD_SATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE,CALLBACK from TB_SELL_ORDER_ORIGCARD_LIST
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert: insert into TB_SELL_ORDER_ORIGCARD_LIST (ORIGCARD_LIST_ID, ORDER_ID, CARD_NO, CARDHOLDER_ID, FIRST_NAME, AMOUNT, VALIDITY_PERIOD, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, CARD_SATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE,CALLBACK) values (#origcardListId:VARCHAR#, #orderId:VARCHAR#, #cardNo:VARCHAR#, #cardholderId:VARCHAR#, #firstName:VARCHAR#, #amount:VARCHAR#, #validityPeriod:VARCHAR#, #productId:VARCHAR#, #productName:VARCHAR#, #cardSate:VARCHAR#, #createUser:VARCHAR#, #createTime:VARCHAR#, #modifyUser:VARCHAR#, #modifyTime:VARCHAR#, #dataState:CHAR#, #callBack:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update:
update TB_SELL_ORDER_ORIGCARD_LIST
ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#
CARD_NO = #cardNo:VARCHAR#
CARDHOLDER_ID = #cardholderId:VARCHAR#
FIRST_NAME = #firstName:VARCHAR#
AMOUNT = #amount:VARCHAR#
VALIDITY_PERIOD = #validityPeriod:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_ID = #productId:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_NAME = #productName:VARCHAR#
CARD_SATE = #cardSate:VARCHAR#
CREATE_USER = #createUser:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:VARCHAR#
MODIFY_USER = #modifyUser:VARCHAR#
MODIFY_TIME = #modifyTime:VARCHAR#
DATA_STATE = #dataState:CHAR#
CALLBACK = #callBack:VARCHAR#
where ORIGCARD_LIST_ID = #origcardListId:VARCHAR#

update TB_SELL_ORDER_ORIGCARD_LIST set ORIGCARD_LIST_ID = #record.origcardListId:VARCHAR#, ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#, CARD_NO = #record.cardNo:VARCHAR#, CARDHOLDER_ID = #record.cardholderId:VARCHAR#, FIRST_NAME = #record.firstName:VARCHAR#, AMOUNT = #record.amount:VARCHAR#, VALIDITY_PERIOD = #record.validityPeriod:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_ID = #record.productId:VARCHAR#, PRODUCT_NAME = #record.productName:VARCHAR#, CARD_SATE = #record.cardSate:VARCHAR#, CREATE_USER = #record.createUser:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:VARCHAR#, MODIFY_USER = #record.modifyUser:VARCHAR#, MODIFY_TIME = #record.modifyTime:VARCHAR#, DATA_STATE = #record.dataState:CHAR#
sqlMap.select: select ocard.origcard_list_id as "origCardListId", ocard.order_id as "orderId", ocard.card_no as "cardNo", ocard.cardholder_id as "cardHolderId", ocard.first_name as "firstName", ocard.product_id as "productId", ocard.product_name as "productName", ocard.amount/100 as "amount", to_char(to_date(ocard.validity_period,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') as "validityPeriod", ocard.card_sate as "cardState", ocard.callback as "callBack" from tb_sell_order_origCard_list ocard where ocard.data_state = '1' and ocard.order_id=#orderId:DECIMAL#

select distinct cardList.Card_No from tb_sell_order ord, tb_sell_order_card_list cardList, tb_entity_stock stock, tb_product prod, tb_sell_order curOrd where ord.order_type in ('10000001','10000002','10000011', '10000012','10000006','10000005') and ord.order_id = cardList.Order_Id and ord.order_state='32' and curOrd.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and ord.process_entity_id=curOrd.process_entity_id and ord.first_entity_id=curOrd.first_entity_id and ord.product_id=prod.product_id
stock.card_no =#cardNo:VARCHAR#
stock.card_no >=#startCardNo:VARCHAR# and stock.card_no <=#endCardNo:VARCHAR#
and stock.stock_state='3' and stock.card_no=cardList.Card_No and NOT exists (select 1 from tb_sell_order_origcard_list origCard where origCard.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and origCard.data_state='1' and origCard.card_no = stock.card_no ) union select distinct sto.card_no from tb_sell_order ord, tb_sell_order_card_list cardl, tb_entity_stock sto, tb_sell_order curOrd where curOrd.Order_Id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and ord.order_state = '32' and ord.first_entity_id=curOrd.First_Entity_Id and ord.process_entity_id=curOrd.Process_Entity_Id and ord.order_type='60000001'
sto.card_no =#cardNo:VARCHAR#
sto.card_no >=#startCardNo:VARCHAR# and sto.card_no <=#endCardNo:VARCHAR#
and sto.stock_state = '3' and cardl.order_id=ord.order_id and sto.card_no=cardl.card_no and NOT exists (select 1 from tb_sell_order_origcard_list origCard where origCard.order_id = #orderId:VARCHAR# and origCard.data_state = '1' and sto.card_no = origCard.card_no )

SELECT cardList.Cardholder_Id from TB_SELL_ORDER_CARD_LIST cardList,tb_sell_order orde where orde.order_id=cardList.Order_Id and orde.order_type !='10000003' and orde.order_type ='60000001' and orde.order_state ='32' and cardList.data_state='1' and cardList.Card_No=#cardNo:VARCHAR#

select distinct cardList.Card_No from tb_sell_order ord, tb_sell_order_card_list cardList, tb_entity_stock stock, tb_product prod, tb_sell_order curOrd where ord.order_type in ('10000001','10000002','10000011', '10000012','10000006','10000005') and ord.order_id = cardList.Order_Id and ord.order_state='32' and curOrd.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and ord.process_entity_id=curOrd.process_entity_id and ord.first_entity_id=curOrd.first_entity_id and ord.product_id=prod.product_id and ord.product_id=#productId:varchar#
stock.card_no =#cardNo:VARCHAR#
and stock.stock_state='3' and stock.card_no=cardList.Card_No and NOT exists (select 1 from tb_sell_order_origcard_list origCard where origCard.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and origCard.data_state='1' and origCard.card_no = stock.card_no ) union select distinct sto.card_no from tb_sell_order ord, tb_sell_order_card_list cardl, tb_entity_stock sto, tb_sell_order curOrd where curOrd.Order_Id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and ord.order_state = '32' and ord.first_entity_id=curOrd.First_Entity_Id and ord.process_entity_id=curOrd.Process_Entity_Id and ord.order_type='60000001'
sto.card_no =#cardNo:VARCHAR#
and sto.stock_state = '3' and cardl.order_id=ord.order_id and sto.card_no=cardl.card_no and NOT exists (select 1 from tb_sell_order_origcard_list origCard where origCard.order_id = #orderId:VARCHAR# and origCard.data_state = '1' and sto.card_no = origCard.card_no )

SELECT tt.product_id as "productId" FROM ( SELECT o.order_id, o.product_id FROM tb_sell_order o WHERE o.product_id= ( SELECT product_id FROM tb_sell_order WHERE order_id= #orderId:VARCHAR# ) AND o.order_state = '32' ) tt WHERE tt.product_id = ( SELECT product_id FROM TB_ENTITY_STOCK t WHERE t.CARD_NO=#cardNo:VARCHAR# AND t.stock_state='3')

select ocard.origcard_list_id as "origCardListId", ocard.order_id as "orderId", ocard.card_no as "cardNo", ocard.cardholder_id as "cardHolderId", ocard.first_name as "firstName", ocard.product_id as "productId", ocard.product_name as "productName", ocard.amount/100 as "amount", ocard.validity_period as "validityPeriod", ocard.card_sate as "cardState" from tb_sell_order_origCard_list ocard where ocard.data_state = '1' and ocard.order_id=#orderId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.update:
update TB_SELL_ORDER_ORIGCARD_LIST
ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#
CARD_NO = #record.cardNo:VARCHAR#
CARDHOLDER_ID = #record.cardholderId:VARCHAR#
FIRST_NAME = #record.firstName:VARCHAR#
AMOUNT = #record.amount:VARCHAR#
VALIDITY_PERIOD = #record.validityPeriod:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_ID = #record.productId:VARCHAR#
PRODUCT_NAME = #record.productName:VARCHAR#
CARD_SATE = #record.cardSate:VARCHAR#
CREATE_USER = #record.createUser:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:VARCHAR#
MODIFY_USER = #record.modifyUser:VARCHAR#
MODIFY_TIME = #record.modifyTime:VARCHAR#
DATA_STATE = #record.dataState:CHAR#
sqlMap.select: select distinct prod.product_name as "productName" from tb_sell_order_origcard_list orig, tb_product prod where orig.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and orig.data_state='1' and orig.product_id=prod.product_id group by prod.product_name

SELECT I.SELLER_NAME "issueName", CUS.CUSTOMER_NAME "custormerName", CUS.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS "customerAddress", CUS.CUSTOMER_TELEPHONE "customerTelephone", CUS.OPER_NAME "operName", CUS.OPER_CRED_TYPE "operCredType", CUS.OPER_CRED_ID "operCredId", SO.ORDER_ID "orderId", SO.ORDER_DATE "orderDate", trim(TO_CHAR(SO.TOTAL_PRICE / 100, '99999999999990.99')) "totalPrice", SO.CARD_QUANTITY "origCardQuantity", trim(TO_CHAR(SO.ORIGCARD_TOTALAMT / 100, '99999999999990.99')) "origCardTotalAmt", trim(TO_CHAR(SO.PACKAGE_FEE / 100, '99999999999990.99')) "packageFee", trim(TO_CHAR(SO.ADDITIONAL_FEE / 100, '99999999999990.99')) "additionalFee", SO.CONTACT_ID "contactId", SO.ORDER_STATE "orderState" FROM TB_SELL_ORDER SO, TB_CUSTOMER CUS, TB_SELLER I WHERE CUS.ENTITY_ID = SO.FIRST_ENTITY_ID AND I.ENTITY_ID = SO.PROCESS_ENTITY_ID AND SO.ORDER_STATE = '35' AND SO.ORDER_TYPE = '70000001' AND SO.ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#
